description: Commissioned as a church this mutable space lends itself to many uses, most recently a gallery. This high windowed  light flooded space with its uniquely shaped  high ceiling,  white walls and wooden floors make an perfect gallery.

factsheet.heading: Stratford Unitarian Meeting House and Gallery
paragraphs: Commissioned  from Fletcher Priest Architects in 20007 as a church this mutable space lends itself to many uses, most recently a gallery.  It has  enabled us to develop a creative welcoming  program open to all.

factsheet.heading: Current Exhibition:  Alison Neville. Travels in Africa
paragraphs:
Alison born in Zimbabwe, has lived her adult life in London. An urge to see what lay between the place of childhood memories and where she now lives, sent her on an overland drawing trip using local transport from Waterloo station to Capetown. 
That and subsequent journeys by ship to West Africa, Senegal, Mali, Burkino Fasso; and on river journeys Congo,Bani,  Niger, Zambezi; have informed the work in this show .
